quest.name: Big Sister Is Watching You
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
Annine is beside herself with worry for her missing brothers.

dialogue.name: ANNINE
dialogue.text: My two brothers set out for Mount Biran Mines to see if there's anything worth salvaging, but they've been gone an awfully long time.

dialogue.name: ANNINE
dialogue.text: Would you be able to go and look for them? I'd go myself, but I hear the place is crawling with all sorts of nasty creatures, and fighting's not my forte. I don't expect you to do it for free, of course.

dialogue.name: ANNINE
dialogue.text: One of them is a bit of a big lad, and the other is also quite big, but slightly less so. I'm sure you'll know them when you see them.

dialogue.name: BROTHERA03499
dialogue.text: She was bloody right when she said it was dangerous here.

dialogue.name: BROTHERA03499
dialogue.text: We ran into a pack of coyotes, and we were separated when we tried to outrun them.

dialogue.name: BROTHERA03499
dialogue.text: I got away but I don't know what's happened to my brother.

dialogue.name: BROTHERA03499
dialogue.text: Hopefully, he found somewhere to hide. Will you help me look for him?

dialogue.name: BROTHERA03499
dialogue.text: I'll join you in the search once I've caught my breath. I don't think I've ever run so fast in my life!

dialogue.name: BROTHERB03499
dialogue.text: Annine sent you to find us? Thanks, stranger. I'd better go and see if my brother is all right.

dialogue.name: BROTHERB03499
dialogue.text: I was afraid we'd never get out of here alive!

dialogue.name: BROTHERA03499
dialogue.text: I never thought I'd be so happy to see him!

dialogue.name: BROTHERB03499
dialogue.text: Now that we've got reinforcements, we should be able to carry on where we left off. It'll be a lot easier with someone to cover our backs.

dialogue.name: BROTHERA03499
dialogue.text: Hold on now, shehe didn't come here for that.

dialogue.name: BROTHERA03499
dialogue.text: Before we get ahead of ourselves, let me give you this. It's the least we can offer you for coming to our rescue.
